application_information.about_this_app: # 100Pay 100Pay is a comprehensive digital payments platform that simplifies financial management for businesses. It offers features like invoicing, payouts, and detailed business analytics. ## Key Features: - **Payments**: Easily accept and manage digital payments. - **Payouts**: Streamline your business payouts. - **Transactions**: View detailed transaction history and reports. - **Invoicing**: Create and manage invoices for your customers. For more information or support, visit the [100Pay Help Center](https://help.100pay.co/) or contact 100Pay support at [support@100pay.co](mailto:support@100pay.co)
application_information.interactive_elements: Users interact, Shares location, Digital purchases
